### isEarlyClobber {#ad8d69e9e180e95d3db75d01a377c4f7b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::InlineAsm::ConstraintInfo::isEarlyClobber = false">
isEarlyClobber - &quot;&amp;&quot;: output operand writes result before inputs are all read.

This is only ever set for an output operand.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h/#l00130">130</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h">InlineAsm.h</a>.

### isIndirect {#acbf697bfd59727faf13eeb80fdf90d79}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::InlineAsm::ConstraintInfo::isIndirect = false">
isIndirect - True if this operand is an indirect operand.

This means that the address of the source or destination is present in the call instruction, instead of it being returned or passed in explicitly. This is represented with a &#39;&#42;&#39; in the asm string.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h">InlineAsm.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### MatchingInput {#a45ceac563ee359193e4d45e3bafeeb64}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="int llvm::InlineAsm::ConstraintInfo::MatchingInput = -1">
MatchingInput - If this is not -1, this is an output constraint where an input constraint is required to match it (e.g.

&quot;0&quot;). The value is the constraint number that matches this one (for example, if this is constraint #0 and constraint #4 has the value &quot;0&quot;, this will be 4).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h/#l00136">136</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h">InlineAsm.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### multipleAlternatives {#abceda5166e96dabf2ea376669b86699d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="SubConstraintInfoVector llvm::InlineAsm::ConstraintInfo::multipleAlternatives">
multipleAlternatives - If there are multiple alternative constraints, this array will contain them.

Otherwise it will be empty.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h/#l00161">161</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/inlineasm-h">InlineAsm.h</a>.
